description:
Fuko faces off against the heavily armed and armored Gashakura. It`s a fight that pits force against intelligence... and they`re going to have to go all out to see which one will win!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuko Fights! A Thin Skin Covered with Wounds!!
Gekitou Fuuko!! Kizu Darake no Suhada!!
激闘風子!! 傷だらけの素肌!!
